msItem.note: The manuscript is incomplete in several places: several leaves between , which has been misbound and whose text follows that of , and and one or more leaves after are missing.
The date at the beginning of the day is not legible.
The date given in the manuscript is 16.
The manuscript is incomplete in several places: leaves are missing between and , and and after .
The end is missing, the manuscript has been misbound.
The end is missing, the manuscript has been misbound.
The beginning is missing, the manuscript has been misbound.
The beginning is missing, the manuscript has been misbound.
Only the last sentence and supplication following the commemoration are remaining, which allow to identify it as the commemoration of a female saint.
The beginning of the first commemoration is missing.
The beginning containing the name of the saint is missing.

msItem.explicit: ተፈጸመ፡ ወርኀ፡ ኅዳር፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አብ፡ ወስብሐት፡ ወክብር፡ ወአኰቴት፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ወትረ፡ እስከ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወአሜን
ተፈጸመ፡ በዝየ፡ ወርኀ፡ ታኅሣሥ፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወላዕልነ፡ ይኩን፡ ምሕረቶ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።

ጸልዩ፡ ለዘ፡ ጸሐፎ ወለዘአጽሐፎ፡ ለአቡነ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ተዝኪሮ፡ ፍቅሮሙ፡ ለጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ እለ፡ ተጽሕፈ፡ አስማቲሆሙ፡ ውስተ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ወይጽሐፍ፡ ስሞሙ፡ ውስተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሕይወት፡ በሰማያት፡ ምስለ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ደቂቁ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ፨ ወይዕቀቦ፡ ምስሎሙ፡ ውሉዱ፡ በጸሎታ፡ ለማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን
ተፈጸመ፡ በዝየ፡ ዘወርኀ፡ ጥር፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወላዕሌነ፡ ይኩን፡ ምሕረቶ፡ አሜን፨ ፨

ወለዘ፡ አጽሐፋ፡ ለዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ አቡነ፡ ተንሥአ ክርስቶስ፡ ይጽሐፍ፡ ስሙ፡ ውስተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሕይወት፡ በሰማያት፡ ኀበ፡ ዐምደ፡ ወርቅ፡ በቀለመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ምስለ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ደቂቁ። በጸሎተ፡ ነቢያት፡ ወሐዋርያት። ወበትንብልናሆሙ፡ ለጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ ወማኅበረ፡ ሰብእ፡ ወመላእክት፡ ወበጸሎታ፡ ለማይራም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ወአሜን፡ ለይኩን። ለይኩን፨
ተፈጸመ፡ ወርኀ፡ የካቲት፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወስብሐት፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ወላዕሌነ፡ ይኩን፡ ምሕረቶ፡ ወለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።

ተጽሕፈት፡ ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ስንክሳር፡ ወዘአጽሐፈሂ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ አቡነ፡
ክርስቶስ፡ ይጽሐፍ፡ ስሙ፡ ውስተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሕይወት፡ በቀለመ፡ ወርቅ፡ ውስተ፡ ዓምደ፡ ብርሃን። ዲበ፡ ተልፍዮስ፡ በምሕረት፡ ወበሣህል፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ ኣሜን። ።

ለዘ፡ ጸሐፎ፡ ወለዘአጽሐፎ፡ ወለዘ፡ አንበቦ፡ ወለዘ፡ ተርጐሞ። ወለሰምዐ፡ ቃላቲሁ፡ ኅቡረ፡ ይምሐ
ሮሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ በጸሎቶሙ፡ ወበስእለቶሙ፡ ለጻድቃን፡ ወስማዕት፡ ዘነቢያት፡ ወሐዋርያት፡ ወመላእክት፡ ትጉሃን። ወበጸሎታ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም። አሜን፡ ወአሜን። ።

ጸልዩ፡ ሊተ፡ ለገብርክሙ፡ ለኃጥእ፡ ወአባሲ፡ ፊቅጦር፡
ዘገደፍኩ፡ ወዘወሰኩ፡ በአእምሮትየ፡ ወበኢያምሮትየ፡ ካህናት፡ ወዲያቆናት፡ እለ፡ አንበብክምዋ፡ ለዛቲ፡ ስክንስን፡ ወሰማዕያነ፡ ለጸሓፊሃ፡ ፊቅጦር፡ ወእግዚእ፡ ይምሓረኒ፡ ምስሌሆሙ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ።

msItem.note: The manuscript ends in the middle of 25 Maggābit

msItem.title: Commemoration of the Council of Dasetā daqiqa ʿAmor
Commemoration of Nǝdǝryānos and his wife, ʾAwsābyos, ʾƎrmā and 40 martyrs
Commemoration of the martyrs of Sǝbǝṭǝsyā
Commemoration of ʾAwzābyos, ʾAksǝndǝros and ʾAlbǝndǝyos
Commemoration of Giyorgis, Taqanāyi, Bolāsyos and ʾabbā Yosāb
Consecration of the church of ʾabbā ʾAsqoron

msItem.note: The beginning and end are missing.

msItem.title: Commemoration of Maqārǝs
msItem.note: The beginning and end are missing.

supportDesc.foliation: Foliated in pencil in the lower right corner.

collation.note: It is not possible to reconstruct the manuscript's quire structure from the images available.

supportDesc.condition: Many leaves are damaged on the borders, which are also darkened by use. The sewing has become detached in several places (e.g. ). Several leaves are damaged by humidity (e.g. . The manuscript has also been damaged by rodents (e.g. ). Several leaves are missing.

layout.note: Data on text area and margin dimensions taken from .
The number of characters in each line is ca. 11-13 per column.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.

list.item: Nine dot asterisk with rubricated middle and four outer dots ፨
Two nine dot asterisks connected by parallel dashes, often with a single dash after the last asterisk ፨=፨- (e.g. )
One nine dot asterisks with a single dash ፨- (e.g. )
Two double colons connected by parallel dashes (e.g. )

layout.ab: Crux ansata with coronis in the left margin next to the beginning of .

handDesc.handNote:
Fine and regular hand. The letters are slender. Many letters, particularly ዐ, ይ and ደ have a triangular form. The sixth order marker of ው is located in the upper third of the letter (). The loops of መ are touching only at the top or completely separated () in all orders. The seventh order marker of ሎ is found directly attached to the base of the letter without a linking line in its upper third () of in its half () . The vowel marker of ል and the fifth order vowel markers show tendencies towards opening (). The second loop of ሣ is smaller than the first (). The uppermost line of እ is horizontal. The vowel marker of ን is a stroke with a serif, extended up- and downwards or downwards (). ፲ has the modern form. The left stroke of ፴ is smaller than the right stroke. ፬ is triangular. ፮ has the compressed form without ring (). No ligature for እግዚአብሔር፡ is used by the main hand. ቤተክርስቲያን፡ is written in one word. Occasional change of nib (. The beginnings of months (for Maskaram and Ṭǝqǝmt: on both columns of the first folio: three pairs of rubricated lines alternating with pairs of black lines at the top and a pair of rubricated lines each in the middle and at the bottom of the folio; for Ḫǝdār, Tāḫśāś, Ṭǝrr and Yakkātit four to five rubricated lines alternating with black lines in both columns at the top of the folio); for Maggābit four pairs of rubricated lines alternating with two or three black lines, days (two to four rubricated lines alternating with black lines), commemorations (one to two rubricated line, e.g. ), numerals (irregularly), elements of punctuation (the middle and four outer dots of ፨; parallel dashes in ፨=፨ ), elements of the sign of cues for the rubricator, elements of the pen-work dividers between days, the word እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ and እግዚአብሔር፡ on , ሃሌሉያ፡ on , ordinals of the miracles narrated in on , the ordinals of the martyrdoms in on , the partly erased name of the commissioner, አቡነ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ on , and , ለአቡነ፡ ዘርአ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ምስለ፡ ኵሎሙ፡ ደቂቁ፡ on , the name of the scribe ፊቅጦር፡ on .
Black, red.

decoNote.desc: Days and commemorations are irregularly divided by pen-work dividers composed of black and red lines and dots.
A line of crux ansata with coronis is used between two lines of pen-dividers before and after the subscription for Ḫǝdār.

item.desc: The ownership note states that the book belongs to Beta Gabrǝʾel.
The ownership note states that the book belongs to Beta Gabrǝʾel.
item.q: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘቤተ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ዘሠረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ ዘሄዶ፡ ወዘተዓገሎ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ወውቁየ፡ ወምቱረ፡ ወርጉመ፡ ይኩን፡ በሰይፈ፡ ቃሎሙ፡ ለሐዋርያት፡ ወበእሳተ፡ ሰይፉ፡ ለገብርኤል፡ መልአከ፡ ብስራት፡ እስከ፡ ለዓለም፡ አሜን።

item.desc: A supplication mentions the name of ʾabuna Tanśǝʾa Krǝstos. The first part of the name is written over effaced space.

Cues for the rubricator consisting of four dots or three dots and a dash at the right, and partly rubricated, are irregularly used throughout the manuscript in the margin left to the text to be inserted.
Scribbles in the left margin and the intercolumn space.
Scribbles in the top and bottom margin.
Crude drawings in the left margin.
Pen trial in the left margin.
Pen trial in the bottom margin.

revisionDesc.change: Identification of content, physical description, transcription of 16-30 Ṭǝrr, 13-30 Yakkātit and 1-25 Maggābit, based on the manuscript's images
Added and corrected text originally transcribed with Transkribus for 21-25 Ṭǝqǝmt
